features: Classic functionality and modest design keep brewing simple and easy for coffee drinkers that love the taste of a great cup of coffee
Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause stops cycle when you need a cup before brewing is finished
Dual Water Window to see exact water level as you fill, for no overflows
Power ON/OFF Indicator lights show coffee maker is in on mode and to remind you to shut it off
Lift & Clean Filter Basket for fast and easy clean up
Height:12.56 x Width:11.76 x Depth:8.43 Inches. Weight: 3.6 Pounds. Cord Length: 26 Inches, Watts: 900
body.description: The classic functionality of Mr. Coffee 12-Cup Manual Coffee Maker helps you make rich-tasting, expertly brewed coffee without stress or mess. Should you need a cup before the brew cycle is finished, Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause is a lifesaver. It stops brewing so you can pour freely, and then finishes the brewing cycle after you place the carafe back in position. It also features a removable basket filter that lifts out for quick and easy filling and cleaning. Whether you want a single cup or 12, this no-fuss automatic coffee maker will deliver the goods, time after time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For coffee drinkers that love great coffee Experience the Taste Since 1970 the Mr. Coffee brand has been doing one thing and one thing only, brewing coffee. No one has served cup after delicious cup to more Americans than us! For us, bringing a rich coffee experience into your home is our top priority. Along with coffee makers, we are here to share everything coffee with you. Simple Brew Classic functionality makes brewing simple and easy. Just set it up, turn it on and brew. There you have it! Rich-tasting coffee expertly-brewed for you. Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause is a coffee lover's dream for pouring a cup before the brew cycle is finished. It stops brewing to grab a rich-tasting cup and then finishes the brewing cycle after the carafe is placed back in position. Experience the taste with the Mr. Coffee brand.

Classic functionality keeps brewing simple and easy Just set it up, turn it on and brew. There you have it! Rich-tasting coffee expertly-brewed for you without the fuss. Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause is a lifesaver when you need a cup before the brew cycle is finished. It stops brewing so you can pour a rich-tasting cup and then finishes the brewing cycle after you place the carafe back in position. We put our best brewing forward with this easy-to-use, Simple Brew coffee maker. Experience the taste with the Mr. Coffee brand.

Dual Water Window Dual Water Window to see exact water level as you fill, for no overflows. Lift & Clean Filter Basket Lift & Clean Filter Basket for fast and easy clean up. Power On/ Off Indicator Lights Power On/ Off Indicator lights show coffee maker is in on mode and to remind you to shut it off. Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause stops cycle when you need a cup before brewing is finished.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For us, this is the best coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: After a couple of years of constant use, our Mr. Coffee still worked, but we couldn’t turn the button off—better safe than sorry, we decided it was time for a new coffee maker. We ordered another brand because it was cheaper and found so many things about it that we did not like. So we are returning that coffee maker, and we bought another Mr. Coffee. Just love this coffee maker. Easy to fill, easy to clean, doesn’t leak all over the place. So much easier to fill from the top than pulling a basket out from the side; side baskets also leak all over the counter. We just enjoy the great coffee and the simple but perfectly functional design of this machine. It may not have a lot of bells and whistles, but we start every day with delicious coffee. Just love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In the era of smart-everything, simple is better.
reviews.reviewText: The classic design cannot be beat. I have been putting this machine through it's paces for 6 years, and it has not disappointed. It is easy to use and nigh indestructible.I purchased it because my last coffee maker was digitally controlled. Well, when the chip started to go, it wouldn't even stay turned on to brew. This machine, without the digital control, just turns on, and then brews.One downside; it is a little tricky to clean the reservoir. However, a little bit of white vinegar run through once or twice every few months keeps the internal pumps clean and the coffee tasting good.Seriously, this has been one of the best appliance purchases I have ever made.The easy design also makes it super easy to self-repair. Some coffee grounds got into the pump, ruining the machine. I was able to easily repair it in an hour myself. In a world where everything breaks immediately and cannot be repaired, I found this ability to be a massive plus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gone back to old school coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Switching from my Keurig coffee pod system to the Mr. Coffee 12-Cup Manual Coffee Maker has been a welcome change. Budget-Friendly: The Mr. Coffee 12-Cup Manual Coffee Maker offers significant cost savings over expensive coffee pods, making it a more economical choice....With climate change etc...being environmentally conscious: This manual coffee maker reduces waste by using ground coffee instead of single-use pods, making it a more eco-friendly option. You can add the ground to your garden, buy a reusable filter and stop using paper ones.With the Mr. Coffee machine, you have complete control over your coffee. You can tailor the strength and flavor to your liking by adjusting the coffee-to-water ratio and brewing time.The 12-cup capacity is perfect for households with multiple coffee drinkers or for when you have guests over...or if you just drink a tun of coffee like I do...not so much of a pain, just grab and pour.Ideal for those who prefer a hassle-free brewing experience....very simple coffee maker.Sometimes less is more. Who needs all the fancy frills when you just want a cup of coffee or multiple for that matter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok but no automatic shut off
reviews.reviewText: Works ok but will stay on h less you turn it off- we had this is our rental and a guest forgot toTurn it off and we are lucky that a day later when the cleaners came that it didn’t burn the house down

Several days ago, while washing the dishes I dropped the coffee cup, which smashed into the coffee pot. Only the coffee cup survived. I waited 4 long days of no-morning coffee waiting for this to arrive. I am a senior with mobility issues who does not drive so its not like I could just run out an buy one. Once I received this, ran a pot of water through it, and finally made that pot of morning coffee - it was the best coffee I ever had and it was the best coffee maker that ever existed! I now leave the coffee pot on the counter and when all the other dishes have been washed and the sink is empty, only then do I wash the coffee pot. Its pretty basic, which is what I wanted, no bells and whistles, very easy to use. The cord is kinda short but that's ok by me as when its not in use its easy to tuck the cord behind it. It does have a little cubby hole to put the cord into to but its easier to just to hid it behind the coffee maker. If I had to I would buy again.

reviews.reviewTitle: good price, good product, nice design
reviews.reviewText: there is nothing I dislike, the coffeemaker looks good, works well and the price was right.
Great coffee maker at an affordable price. Makes piping hot coffee the way it should be. East to use maker just in an off button. Would buy this product again in future. I also make hot tea in it
It's simple, no programming, not another clock to look at. Just load the coffee/water & turn on! Just what I was looking for & bonus... Came in environmental friendly packaging! Way to go Mr. Coffee!

As a one button manual coffee maker, it's great for seniors who struggle with unecessary gadgetry. I bought it for my parents to replace a well used older version of the same model. However after less than 2 months the on/off switch stopped working and I had to purchase another replacement. Im hoping this one holds out longer.
